beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Walburg Dirty 30 breaks you. 30 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 8
beats.narration: Mile 8. The False Promise. Rolling farm roads make you feel clever about your pacing strategy. Save the victory lap. you're burning matches you'll need later.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 18
beats.narration: Mile 18. Reality Check Ridge. The climbs start stacking and the limestone kicks up through worn gravel. Your legs remember this isn't a recovery ride anymore.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 25
beats.narration: Mile 25. The Reckoning. Exposed ridgeline climbing where the wind picks a direction just to mess with you. Whatever fitness you thought you had gets audited here.
